sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import jsPDF from "jspdf" import "jspdf-autotable" const Invoices = () => { const [batchSlips, setBatchSlips] = useState([]) const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false) const [modalContent, setModalContent] = useState(null) const [modalType, setModalType] = useState("") // 'invoice' or 'batchslip' useEffect(() => { // Load batch slips from localStorage const savedBatchSlips = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("batchSlips") || "[]") setBatchSlips(savedBatchSlips) }, []) const generateInvoicePDF = (invoice) => { const doc = new jsPDF() // Header doc.setFontSize(16) doc.setFont(undefined, "bold") doc.text("RR CONSTRUCTIONS", 20, 20) doc.text("Tax Invoice", 150, 20) doc.setFontSize(10) doc.setFont(undefined, "normal") doc.text("GSTIN: 33AAGFT4474P1Z1", 20, 30) doc.text(`Invoice No: ${invoice.invoiceNumber}`, 150, 30) doc.text("Excel College Campus, NH 91, Mathura", 20, 35) doc.text(`Date: ${new Date(invoice.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}`, 150, 35) doc.text("Road, Haryana - 121102", 20, 40) doc.text(`Batch Number: ${invoice.batchNumber}`, 150, 40) doc.text("GST/NSN: 33AAGFT4474P1Z1", 20, 45) doc.text("Terms of Delivery: As per Order &", 150, 45) doc.text("Biller: INFRA LP", 20, 50) doc.text("Cheque", 150, 50) doc.text("State Name: Tamil Nadu, India", 20, 55) // Bill To section doc.setFont(undefined, "bold") doc.text("Bill To:", 20, 70) doc.text("Dispatch Site:", 150, 70) doc.setFont(undefined, "normal") doc.text(invoice.clientName, 20, 80) doc.text("N/A", 150, 80) doc.text(invoice.clientAddress, 20, 85) doc.text("Bill of Lading/Ref No: N/A", 150, 85) doc.text(`GSTIN: ${invoice.clientGSTIN || "N/A"}`, 20, 90) // Table const tableData = [ [invoice.description, invoice.hsn, invoice.quantity, `₹${invoice.rate}`, invoice.unit, `₹${invoice.total}`], ] doc.autoTable({ startY: 100, head: [["Description", "HSN", "Quantity", "Rate", "Per", "Amount"]], body: tableData, theme: "grid", }) // Totals const finalY = doc.lastAutoTable.finalY + 10 doc.text(`Total: ₹${invoice.total}`, 150, finalY) doc.text(`Output-CGST @ 9%: ₹${invoice.cgst}`, 150, finalY + 10) doc.text(`Output-SGST @ 9%: ₹${invoice.sgst}`, 150, finalY + 20) doc.setFont(undefined, "bold") doc.text(`Grand Total: ₹${invoice.grandTotal}`, 150, finalY + 30) // Amount in words doc.setFont(undefined, "normal") doc.text(`Amount Chargeable (in words): ${invoice.amountInWords}`, 20, finalY + 50) // Footer doc.text("Subject to the Tirupati Jurisdiction", 20, finalY + 70) doc.text("This is a Computer Generated Invoice", 150, finalY + 70) doc.text("Authorised Signatory", 20, finalY + 80) return doc } const generateBatchSlipPDF = (batchSlip) => { const doc = new jsPDF() // Header doc.setFontSize(16) doc.setFont(undefined, "bold") doc.text("RR CONSTRUCTIONS", 105, 20, { align: "center" }) doc.setFontSize(10) doc.setFont(undefined, "normal") doc.text("MCI 70 Control System Ver 3.1", 105, 30, { align: "center" }) doc.text("SCHWING Stetter", 105, 35, { align: "center" }) // Batch details doc.setFont(undefined, "bold") doc.text("Docket / Batch Report / Autographic Record", 20, 50) doc.text(`Plant Serial Number: ${batchSlip.plantSerialNumber}`, 150, 50) doc.setFont(undefined, "normal") doc.text(`Batch Date: ${batchSlip.batchDate}`, 20, 60) doc.text(`Ordered Quantity: ${batchSlip.orderedQuantity} M³`, 150, 60) doc.text(`Batch Start Time: ${batchSlip.batchStartTime}`, 20, 65) doc.text(`Production Quantity: ${batchSlip.productionQuantity} M³`, 150, 65) doc.text(`Batch End Time: ${batchSlip.batchEndTime}`, 20, 70) doc.text(`Adj/Manual Quantity: ${batchSlip.adjManualQuantity} M³`, 150, 70) doc.text(`Batch Number: ${batchSlip.batchNumber}`, 20, 75) doc.text(`With This Load: ${batchSlip.withThisLoad} M³`, 150, 75) doc.text(`Customer: ${batchSlip.customer}`, 20, 80) doc.text(`Mixer Capacity: ${batchSlip.mixerCapacity} M³`, 150, 80) doc.text(`Site: ${batchSlip.site}`, 20, 85) doc.text(`Batch Size: ${batchSlip.batchSize} M³`, 150, 85) doc.text(`Recipe Code: ${batchSlip.recipeCode}`, 20, 90) doc.text(`Recipe Name: ${batchSlip.recipeName}`, 20, 95) doc.text(`Truck Number: ${batchSlip.truckNumber}`, 20, 100) doc.text(`Truck Driver: ${batchSlip.truckDriver}`, 20, 105) doc.text(`Order Number: ${batchSlip.orderNumber}`, 20, 110) doc.text(`Batcher Name: ${batchSlip.batcherName}`, 20, 115) // Material table (simplified) const materialHeaders = [ "Batch Size in M³", "SAND", "40 MM", "20 MM", "0", "CEM-1", "CEM-2", "CEM-3", "WATER", "ADMIX1", ] const materialData = batchSlip.materialData .slice(0, 5) .map((row, index) => [ `${index + 1}`, row.sand, row.mm40, row.mm20, row.mm0, row.cem1, row.cem2, row.cem3, row.water, row.admix1, ]) doc.autoTable({ startY: 125, head: [materialHeaders], body: materialData, theme: "grid", styles: { fontSize: 8 }, }) // Totals const finalY = doc.lastAutoTable.finalY + 5 doc.autoTable({ startY: finalY, head: [["Total Set Weight", "SAND", "40 MM", "20 MM", "0", "CEM-1", "CEM-2", "CEM-3", "WATER", "ADMIX1"]], body: [ [ "Total", batchSlip.totalSand, batchSlip.totalMm40, batchSlip.totalMm20, "0.00", batchSlip.totalCem1, batchSlip.totalCem2, batchSlip.totalCem3, batchSlip.totalWater, batchSlip.totalAdmix1, ], ], theme: "grid", styles: { fontSize: 8 }, }) doc.text(`Batcher Name: ${batchSlip.batcherName}`, 20, doc.lastAutoTable.finalY + 15) return doc } // Invoice Actions const viewInvoice = (invoice) => { setModalContent(invoice) setModalType("invoice") setShowModal(true) } const downloadInvoice = (invoice) => { const doc = generateInvoicePDF(invoice) doc.save(`Invoice_${invoice.invoiceNumber}.pdf`) } const sendInvoice = (invoice) => { console.log("Sending invoice:", invoice) alert(`Invoice ${invoice.invoiceNumber} sent to ${invoice.clientEmail}`) } // Batch Slip Actions const viewBatchSlip = (batchSlip) => { setModalContent(batchSlip) setModalType("batchslip") setShowModal(true) } const downloadBatchSlip = (batchSlip) => { const doc = generateBatchSlipPDF(batchSlip) doc.save(`BatchSlip_${batchSlip.batchNumber}.pdf`) } const sendBatchSlip = (batchSlip) => { console.log("Sending batch slip:", batchSlip) alert(`Batch slip ${batchSlip.batchNumber} sent to ${batchSlip.clientEmail}`) } return (
🧾

Invoices & Batch Slips

{/* Invoice Details Table */}

Invoice Details

{batchSlips.map((invoice, index) => ( ))}
S.No Invoice Number Date Client Name Description Grand Total (₹) Actions
{index + 1} {invoice.invoiceNumber} {new Date(invoice.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()} {invoice.clientName} {invoice.description} ₹{invoice.grandTotal}
{batchSlips.length === 0 && (

No invoices found. Create a batch slip to generate invoices.

)}
{/* Batch Slip Details Table */}

Batch Slip Details

{batchSlips.map((batchSlip, index) => ( ))}
S.No Batch Number Batch Date Customer Recipe Code Quantity (M³) Client Mail Client Address Actions
{index + 1} {batchSlip.batchNumber} {batchSlip.batchDate} {batchSlip.customer} {batchSlip.recipeCode} {batchSlip.quantity} {batchSlip.clientEmail} {batchSlip.clientAddress}
{batchSlips.length === 0 && (

No batch slips found. Create a batch slip to see details here.

)}
{/* Modal for Invoice/Batch Slip View */} {showModal && modalContent && (
setShowModal(false)}>
e.stopPropagation()}>

{modalType === "invoice" ? "Invoice Preview" : "Batch Slip Preview"}

{modalType === "invoice" ? (
{/* Company Header */}

RR CONSTRUCTIONS

GSTIN: 33AAGFT4474P1Z1

Excel College Campus, NH 91, Mathura Road, Haryana - 121102

GST/NSN: 33AAGFT4474P1Z1

Biller: INFRA LP

State Name: Tamil Nadu, India

Tax Invoice

Invoice No: {modalContent.invoiceNumber}

Date: {new Date(modalContent.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}

Batch Number: {modalContent.batchNumber}

Terms of Delivery: As per Order & Cheque

{/* Bill To Section */}

Bill To:

{modalContent.clientName}

{modalContent.clientAddress}

GSTIN: {modalContent.clientGSTIN || "N/A"}

Dispatch Site:

N/A

Bill of Lading/Ref No: N/A

{/* Invoice Table */}
Description HSN Quantity Rate Per Amount
{modalContent.description} {modalContent.hsn} {modalContent.quantity} ₹{modalContent.rate} {modalContent.unit} ₹{modalContent.total}
Total ₹{modalContent.total}
Output-CGST @ 9% ₹{modalContent.cgst}
Output-SGST @ 9% ₹{modalContent.sgst}
Grand Total ₹{modalContent.grandTotal}
{/* Footer */}

Amount Chargeable (in words): {modalContent.amountInWords}

Subject to the Tirupati Jurisdiction

This is a Computer Generated Invoice

Authorised Signatory

) : (

RR CONSTRUCTIONS

MCI 70 Control System Ver 3.1

SCHWING Stetter

Docket / Batch Report / Autographic Record

Plant Serial Number: {modalContent.plantSerialNumber}
Batch Date: {modalContent.batchDate}
Batch Number: {modalContent.batchNumber}
Customer: {modalContent.customer}
Recipe Code: {modalContent.recipeCode}
Recipe Name: {modalContent.recipeName}
Truck Number: {modalContent.truckNumber}
Truck Driver: {modalContent.truckDriver}
Batcher Name: {modalContent.batcherName}
)}
)}
) } export default Invoices
